thinkpol.message_queue package¶

Submodules¶

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver module¶

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver.create_parser_consumer(host, port)¶

Creates a function that consumes data from the server’s message queue using a given parser, and sends that parsed data to another message queue where it’s received by a saver.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host of the message queue connection

  • port (str) – the port of the message queue connection

Returns

the consuming function

Return type

callable

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver.create_saver_consumer(host, port)¶

Creates a consuming function a saver can use to receive parsed snapshots from parsers’ message queues.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host of the message queue connection

  • port (str) – the port of the message queue connection

Returns

the consuming function

Return type

callable

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver.create_server_publisher(host, port)¶

Creates a publishing function a server can use to upload snapshots to be parsed by functions in the message queue.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host of the message queue connection

  • port (str) – the port of the message queue connection

Returns

the publishing function

Return type

callable

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver.make_callback_parser(parser, host, port)¶

Gets a parser and an address and creates a callback function that receives messages from the message queue, parses them and publishes them to the saver.

thinkpol.message_queue.rabbitmq_driver.make_callback_saver(field, saver)¶

Gets a saver and a field and returns a callback function that receives messages from the message queue and saves them to the database.

Module contents¶

A driver containing functions the various parts of the project that need a message queue can use, using rabbitmq.

Thinkpol
